text: The 1981 Cadet World Championship was held in Buenos Aires, Argentina between 27 December 1981 and 2 January 1982. ==Podium== {| |- |Cadet World Championship | | | |- |} ==External links== Category:1981 in sailing Category:Sailing competitions in Argentina Category:Sport in Buenos Aires Category:Cadet World Championships
title: 1981 Cadet World Championship
